context: Hi there What kind of movies do you like?
Hi there, I like The Shawshank Redemption (1994)
I like movies the whole family can enjoy. Jumanji (2017), for example.

Have you seen The Green Mile (1999) ? Or Schindler's List (1993) ?
Yes I love The Green Mile (1999), I cried so hard when they executed him I have seen Schindler's List (1993) too, you must like sad monvies
resp: Well, they are sort of along the same line as The Shawshank Redemption (1994)
